Title: Elite Squad
Writer: André Batista (book), Bráulio Mantovani, José Padilha, Rodrigo Pimentel (book), Rodrigo Pimentel, Luiz Eduardo Soares (book)
Actors: Wagner Moura, André Ramiro, Caio Junqueira, Milhem Cortaz
Plot: In 1997 Rio de Janeiro, Captain Nascimento has to find a substitute for his position while trying to take down drug dealers and criminals before the Pope visits.
Language: Portuguese, Greek, Latin, French, English, German, Italian, Spanish
Production: Quanta Centro de Produções, Zazen Producoes, Estúdios Mega, Weinstein Company, Universal Pictures
